title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 930.3 - Certain covered persons prohibited from receiving payment for speeches
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 930.3 - Certain covered persons prohibited from receiving payment for speeches

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any other provision of this Part and pursuant
to Public Officers Law section 73(5-a)(b), no statewide elected official or any
head of a civil department shall, directly or indirectly, solicit, accept, or
receive any payment made in consideration for any speech given at a public or
private conference, convention, meeting, social event, meal, or like
gathering. Notes

Adopted, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 24, effective
6/18/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
